statements.select: SELECT EQP_ID , FILE_ID , ICON_ID , EQP_NM , EQP_CONTENT , EQP_WIDTH , EQP_HEIGHT , EQP_X , EQP_Y , EQP_VISIBLE , EQP_ENABLE , CRT_ID , CRT_DT , CHG_ID , CHG_DT FROM EQUIPMENT WHERE EQP_ID = #EQP_ID#
SELECT EQP_ID , FILE_ID , ICON_ID , EQP_NM , EQP_CONTENT , EQP_WIDTH , EQP_HEIGHT , EQP_X , EQP_Y , EQP_VISIBLE , EQP_ENABLE , CRT_ID , CRT_DT , CHG_ID , CHG_DT FROM EQUIPMENT WHERE EQP_ID = #EQP_ID#
